      • projectToManifold

        public Vector3 projectToManifold(Vector3 surfacePoint,
                                 Vector3 vect)
        Description copied from interface: Manifold
        Projects a vector onto the surface. The tail of the vector must originate on a point on the surface.
        Parameters:
        surfacePoint - A point on the surface
        vect - The vector on the surface
        Returns:
        The projection of the vector onto the surface

        Returns:
